history.content: No, CS does not have this requirement. This is actually an L&S vs CoE issue, not a CS vs EECS one

I am a third year L&S CS major and data science minor. I just enrolled in CS 188, DATA 144, and DEMOG 180 for the fall. I will be finishing the data science minor in fall, and then I have 2 CS upper div requirements left for spring 2021 (my graduation semester).

Does anyone know if L&S CS has a 2 technicals per semester towards the major requirement? Or is that only EECS? This post @37 says only EECS, but it's from 5 years ago. I've been looking at the major website and on EECS101, but I didn't find posts about L&S CS specifically (and also had difficulty located where the policy is mentioned for EECS as well). Will I be penalized for only doing one technical class next semester that goes towards the L&S CS major when I haven't finished the major yet?
history.subject: Does L&S CS have a 2 technical requirement towards the major like EECS?
